definition: Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: After the War of Resistance Against Japan, Tsinghua University was removed from Kunming to Beiping in 1946.
sentences.chinese: 清華大學在抗戰勝利後的1946年由昆明遷回北平。

sentences.english: The largest group was from Tsinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 其中最大的代表團來自於清華大學。

sentences.english: Jibing Chen got both Bachelor's and Master degree from Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics.
sentences.chinese: 他在清華大學獲得自動化專業學士和碩士學位。

sentences.english: He is reading electron physics at Qinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 他現在在清華大學攻讀電子物理學。

sentences.english: Processing and Application of Biodegradable Materials by Electrospinning , Tsinghua University , Ping Hu.
sentences.chinese: 生物分解材料的電紡絲加工與應用，清華大學，胡平。

sentences.english: In 2015, Zhao started classes at National Tsing Hua University.
sentences.chinese: 2015年，趙慕鶴老人開始在國立清華大學上課。

sentences.english: Ma Yongliang is a professor with Tsinghua University's school of environment.
sentences.chinese: 馬永亮是清華大學環境學院教授。

sentences.english: The Universiade torch is expected to be lit at the prestigious Qinghua University in Beijing in April.
sentences.chinese: 本次大運會火炬將於4月在北京的清華大學點燃。

sentences.english: Two years ago, I graduated from Tsinghua University. I majored in International Trade.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前我畢業於清華大學，主修國際貿易。

sentences.english: Only last year did Tsinghua reopen to an enrollment of 2,800 students.
sentences.chinese: 僅在最後一年，清華大學重新有2800名學生入學。

sentences.english: Dept. of Automatic Control of Tsinghua University, the former name of Dept. of Computer Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 清華大學自動控制系，計算機科學與技術系前身。

sentences.english: Should Tsinghua University Revoke Zhou Senfeng's Master's Degree?
sentences.chinese: 清華大學是否應該撤銷周森鋒的碩士學位？

sentences.english: She graduated from Qinghua University with the B. A. degree in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 她2002年畢業於清華大學，獲文學士學位。

sentences.english: But Zheng Siqi of Beijing’s Tsinghua University worries whether the building boom is sustainable.
sentences.chinese: 然而北京清華大學的鄭思齊擔心這股建築潮是否穩定。

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Zhong1 wen2 Da4 xue2

definition: Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists
abbr. for 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 Da4 xue2]

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Jiao1 tong1 Da4 xue2

definition: Jinan University in Guangdong Province, with 4 campuses in Guangzhou, Shenzhen and Zhuhai
National Taiwan University/abbr. to 臺大|台大[Tai2 Da4]

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2
Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Da4 xue2
